subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5722 is on the way
description_text:
Good afternoon,

I have to leave town unexpectedly and was curious if you had a time frame
on when this will ship. Only reason I ask is so I can have someone come to
my house to collect the package,If it arrives while I am gone.

Thanks for your time

Eric

conversations.body_text: Hi eric marr,    Your package is scheduled for delivery next Monday.  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=887601265558&trkqual=12029~887601265558~FDEG
